changelog_html:
1.0.0 - 2026-01-01

  • Initial release
  • Event configuration with conditions and parameters
  • Support for automatic, click, video, and form events
  • Cookiebot consent integration
  • Server-side UTM persistence
  • Debug mode with event logging
  • Import/Export functionality
description: Manage and track GA4 events with an easy-to-use WordPress admin interface. Features include conditional event triggers, Cookiebot consent integration, and comprehensive event logging.
